coreAttributes.authorTag: You can read on the tag inside that it was made by 'GLIDE'.
coreAttributes.name: martial arts shorts
coreAttributes.description: A pair of lightweight shorts designed for combat sports.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the waistband on [npc.his] shorts by lifting the velcro flap at the front, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the waistband on [npc2.namePos] shorts by lifting the velcro flap at the front, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcefully [npc.verb(pull)] on the velcro flap at the front og [npc2.namePos] shorts to looesen the waistband, before yanking them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the shorts, before pulling them up at [npc.his] waist to secure them by closing the velcro flap at the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the shorts, before pulling them up at [npc2.his] waist to secure them by closing the velcro flap at the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(make)] [npc2.name] step into and wear the shorts.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lift)] the velcro flap on [npc.his] shorts open, before pulling them down.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lift)] the velcro flap on [npc2.namePos] shorts open, before pulling them down.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] forcefully [npc.verb(rip)] [npc2.namePos] shorts open, before yanking them down.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the shorts on, before securing them at [npc.his] waist by closing the velcro flap at the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the shorts on [npc2.name], before securing them at [npc2.his] waist by closing the velcro flap at the front.
